basics.name: Teerasak Vichadee
basics.label: Full Stack Software Engineer (Node.js, React)
basics.summary: Highly motivated and results-oriented software engineering leader with 15+ years of experience across diverse technical domains. Proven ability to lead and mentor teams, build scalable software solutions and deliver impactful projects aligned with business goals. Expertise in full-stack development, software design, product ownership, and Agile methodologies.

work.name: SCB â€“ Siam Commercial Bank
work.summary:
- Lead frontend development team to build a new ERP platform to replace a legacy system.
- Lead product owner team, consult and training them to work with user and prepare business requirement for development team.
- Research and refactor old frontend code to support requirement and make it maintainable.
- Consult product manager and suggest for solution to manage project.

Technology used: React.js, Redux, Spring Cloud Gateway, EKS, Kubernetes

work.name: Ascend Corporation
work.summary:
- Manage story backlog, discuss with customer and our user in warehouse, and build product roadmap for Aden's WMS software.
- Increase efficiency in warehouse by modified feature to support current operation and improve system performance.
- Integrate with customer system both SAP and in-house software and also integrate with 3rd party logistic provider.
- Successfully launch a new project for company to open business opportunities as gateway provider between parcel delivery service and other merchant.

Skill used: Software Requirement, Product Owner Mindset, Project Management Mindset, Leadership, Presentation, BPMN

work.name: Ascend Corporation
work.summary:
- Consult product owner to create road map
- Leading Agile team, Analyst, research and implement inventory fullfilment system for company's warehouse
- Increased team's performance by build teach sharing meeting every sprint (2 weeks) and implement code quality tools such as SonarQube, and sometime join code review session
- Leverage knowledge in Java, Spring framework, React, Docker, Terraform, ECS, ElasticCache, Serverless framework, Node.js, Express.js, Fastify.js, Jenkins, Gitlab
- Do prove of concept task for development team
- Experience in logistic business (we don't just implement software we need to think about business and operation process too!)

Technology used: Java (Spring Boot, Spark, DropWizard, HikariCP, ...), Micro Services, Message Queue, AWS, ECS, Lambda, Node.js, Serverless Framework, CouchDB, PouchDB, React.js, Redux, Firebase (Hosting, Realtime DB, Cloud Firestore), EKL, etc.

projects.name: Parcel Delivery Gateway Service
projects.summary:
As a product owner, I gathering requirement from business and build a product road map, create product backlog and add detail for MVP phase. With help from our outsources friend we can launch, but I have left the company before first customer use it.

We've use Spring Framework and React deploy on AWS Beanstalk use RDS as database.

projects.name: Inventory Management Gateway Service
projects.summary: As development team lead, I research and design architect to build an interface for our customer to integrate with our warehouse management system. We have a lot of problem from our legacy system, so we decide to use AWS Lambda as interface receive request from 3rd party send data to message queue and manipulate request and send to our legacy system.
